mdRecord.dcterms:title: Plato / with an English translation by H. N. Fowler and an introduction by W. R. M. Lamb
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bury, Robert Gregg, 1869-1951
Fowler, Harold North, 1859-1955
Lamb, W. R. M. (Walter Rangeley Maitland), 1882-1961
Plato.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: v. 1. Euthyphro. Apology. Crito. Phaedo. Phaedrus. -- v. 2. Theatetus. Sophist. -- v. 3. The Statesman. Philebus. Ion. -- v. 4. Laches. Protagoras. Meno. Enthydemus. -- v. 5. Lysis. Symposium. Gorgias. -- v. 6. Cratylus. Parmenides. Greater Hippias. Lesser Hippias. -- v. 7. Timaeus. Critias. Cleitophon. Menexenus. Epistles. -- v. 8. Charmides. Alcibiades I and II. Hipparchus. The lovers. The ages. Minos. Epinomis. -- v. 9-10. The laws.
Translators: v. 1-3 (The statesman, Philebus) 6, H.N. Fowler; v. 3. (Ion) 4,5,8, W.R.M. Lamb; v. 7,9,10, R.G. Bury.
Greek and English on opposite pages.
Item X000097313 has bookplate data: Prof. Robert Kent Gooch. Item X000097315 has bookplate data: Prof. Robert Kent Gooch.
